pr_title: Remove dependency upon internet URLs for selenium tests

timeline.message: Remove dependency upon internet URLs for selenium tests

timeline.bodyText: There's no real sense in having two ways to test that Selenium is working, so just removed this altogether.
timeline.author: rnorth

timeline.bodyText: This was old and ignored anyway, so have just removed.
timeline.author: rnorth

timeline.bodyText: Given that all our tests will now use 'linked' (networked) containers, there's little point in having an explicit test for it that works another way.
timeline.author: rnorth
